archimate:Requirement.name: BC.1.1.5g: g) sensitive information (i.e. information that can only be disclosed to authorised individuals) and critical information (i.e. information that needs to be available and have integrity) remains protected in the event of a disaster or emergency.
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
